attributes.action: UK government must exploit the crucial UK shale gas reserves.
attributes.additional_details: To counter Western European dependence on Russian gas supplies at a time of very serious international tension and economic risk.
attributes.background: Legislate to proceed with shale gas production

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

End the ban on fracking: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608745

Commit to UK natural gas and increase investment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608274
